content.text: I am doing well, thank you for asking! I am a teacher and I enjoy it very much.
That sounds like a fun job! I just got hired as a security guard.
Congratulations! I am sure you will be great at that job.
Thank you! I am excited to start.
That is great! What kind of hobbies do you enjoy?
I like to spend time with my family, but we are all very busy.
I understand that. I am also close to my family, but we are all very busy as well.
That is awesome! I am also Italian American!
That is great! I am from New York City. Where are you from?
That is not too far from me
